hierarchical_expansion.description: Supports nested subcategories for future expansion

metadata_fields.Training_Set_ID: Links to the training dataset used for AI processing (e.g., T.P.S.FAC.001.set)
metadata_fields.Target_Asset: The asset being customized or referenced (e.g., S.POP.PNK.001)
metadata_fields.Premium: Indicates if the asset is premium (branded) (e.g., 'Yes' for B.L.GUC.BAG.001)
metadata_fields.Provenance: Tracks the assetâ€™s origin and transformations (e.g., 'Created by ReViz, remixed by User123')
metadata_fields.Rights_Split: Revenue distribution for monetization (e.g., 'IP Holders: 25%, ReViz: 25%, Remixer: 50%')
metadata_fields.Popularity_Score: Numerical rating (0-100) based on views, likes, shares
metadata_fields.Trending_Factor: Growth rate of asset usage over time
metadata_fields.Engagement_Rate: Percentage of users who interact after viewing
metadata_fields.Creator_Boost: Engagement multiplier when used by verified creators
metadata_fields.Deprecated: Boolean indicating if asset is deprecated
metadata_fields.Replacement: Reference to replacement asset if deprecated
metadata_fields.License_Expiration: Date when branded content licenses expire (e.g., '2025-12-31')
metadata_fields.Seasonal_Relevance: Periods when content is most relevant (e.g., 'Summer', 'Holiday')
metadata_fields.Regional_Popularity: Regions where asset is most popular (e.g., 'US', 'JP')
metadata_fields.Locale: Geographic area of relevance or origin (e.g., 'US', 'IN')
metadata_fields.File_Size: Size of the asset in MB
metadata_fields.Duration: Length of the asset in seconds (for time-based assets)

metadata_fields.Training_Set_ID: Links to the training dataset used for AI processing (e.g., T.P.S.FAC.001.set)
metadata_fields.Target_Asset: The asset being customized or referenced (e.g., S.POP.PNK.001)
metadata_fields.Premium: Indicates if the asset is premium (branded) (e.g., 'Yes' for B.L.GUC.BAG.001)
metadata_fields.Provenance: Tracks the assetâ€™s origin and transformations (e.g., 'Created by ReViz, remixed by User123')
metadata_fields.Rights_Split: Revenue distribution for monetization (e.g., 'IP Holders: 25%, ReViz: 25%, Remixer: 50%')
metadata_fields.Popularity_Score: Numerical rating (0-100) based on views, likes, shares
metadata_fields.Trending_Factor: Growth rate of asset usage over time
metadata_fields.Engagement_Rate: Percentage of users who interact after viewing
metadata_fields.Creator_Boost: Engagement multiplier when used by verified creators
metadata_fields.Deprecated: Boolean indicating if asset is deprecated
metadata_fields.Replacement: Reference to replacement asset if deprecated
metadata_fields.License_Expiration: Date when branded content licenses expire (e.g., '2025-12-31')
metadata_fields.Seasonal_Relevance: Periods when content is most relevant (e.g., 'Summer', 'Holiday')
metadata_fields.Regional_Popularity: Regions where asset is most popular (e.g., 'US', 'JP')
metadata_fields.Locale: Geographic area of relevance or origin (e.g., 'US', 'IN')
metadata_fields.File_Size: Size of the asset in MB
metadata_fields.Duration: Length of the asset in seconds (for time-based assets)
metadata_fields.Movement_Speed: Tempo of movement execution (Slow, Medium, Fast)
metadata_fields.Energy_Level: Dynamic quality of movement (Low, Medium, High)
metadata_fields.Movement_Plane: Primary plane of movement (Sagittal, Frontal, Transverse)
metadata_fields.Primary_Body_Parts: List of primary body parts involved (e.g., ['Arms', 'Legs', 'Torso', 'Full Body'])
metadata_fields.Movement_Quality: Character of movement (Sharp, Fluid, Percussive, Sustained)
metadata_fields.Weight_Transfer: How weight shifts during movement (e.g., 'Left to Right', 'Forward to Backward')
metadata_fields.Spatial_Pattern: Movement pattern in space (Linear, Circular, Diagonal)
metadata_fields.Tutorial_Available: Boolean indicating if tutorial is available
metadata_fields.Tutorial_Link: Link to tutorial content for this move (e.g., 'https://reviz.co/tutorials/moves/M.001.002.001')
metadata_fields.Breakdown_Steps: Array of step-by-step instructions (e.g., ['Step 1: Position arms', 'Step 2: Shift weight'])
metadata_fields.Historical_Context: Historical background of the movement (e.g., 'Originated in 1980s hip-hop culture')
metadata_fields.Associated_Music: Music genres typically associated with this move (e.g., 'Hip-Hop', 'Pop')
metadata_fields.Common_Errors: Typical mistakes made when learning this move (e.g., 'Incorrect weight distribution')
metadata_fields.Preparation_Moves: Movements that typically precede this one (e.g., 'M.001.001.001')
metadata_fields.Follow_Up_Moves: Movements that naturally follow this one (e.g., 'M.001.003.001')
metadata_fields.Compatible_Moves: Other moves that blend well with this one (e.g., 'M.002.001.001')
